text: Rosa Posada in 1980 Rosa María Posada Chapado (Madrid, 17 January 1940 — Madrid, 29 October 2014)Fallece Rosa Posada, vicepresidenta primera de la Asamblea de Madrid was a Spanish lawyer and politician. She served as President of the Assembly of Madrid (1987-1991) as well as Vice President. == References == Category:Spanish lawyers Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:People from Madrid Category:1940 births Category:Democratic and Social Centre (Spain) politicians Category:People's Party (Spain) politicians Category:Presidents of the Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 2nd Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 4th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 5th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 6th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 7th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 8th Assembly of Madrid Category:Members of the 9th Assembly of Madrid Category:First Secretaries of the Assembly of Madrid Category:First Vice Presidents of the Assembly of Madrid Category:Government ministers of the Community of Madrid Category:Members of the People's Parliamentary Group (Assembly of Madrid)
title: Rosa Posada
